Description:
Unbelievable Value!
WOW! This property will be snapped up fast - Having recently had a fresh makeover with new paintwork internally together with new carpets and blinds as well make this one property not only ready for you to move into but presenting incredible value for money! Some key features on offer include:
- Four bedrooms
- Full ensuite and walk-in robe to master
- Two separate living zones
- Tiled meals area
- Spacious kitchen
- New Dishwasher
- SS Appliance's
- Overhead cupboards
- Two Reverse cycle heating/cooling units
- Double lock up garage
- Internal access
- Remote control
- Rear roller door access
- Additional side access to back yard
- Low maintenance gardens
- Massive 600m2 of land
This is perfect for the owner occupier or savvy investor looking to establish themselves in this highly popular area with its ease of access to major shopping centres, schools and parklands make it a clear winner. Make sure you have this on your must inspect list of homes or you will miss out!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our department head of rentals Melanie Keating has appraised this property at $380-$390p/w ($1,651-$1,695) for more details about leasing contact Melanie on 03 9705 3000 today.

Description:
Plenty of room - Excellent Location
This brick veneer home on a block of approximately 606 square metre block consists of 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, very large lounge, a large kitchen with adjoining spacious living area, renovated bathroom, large laundry and separate toilet. There is a wide enclosed pegola that spans the width of the back of the house. The enclosed carport holds four cars it has two separate roller doors and has sufficient height for 4WD's as well as a boat. In the back yard is a good size brick shed with power and is current used as a workshop, garden shed, and small plant nursery The home has NBN connection, Split System air conditioner, ducted heating, Solar Panels, LED lighting, extensive outdoor lighting and other extras. This property has a neat private backyard and has street appeal. Situated within an easy walk to Cranbourne Station, various bus stops, Doctors & Chemist, local shops, The Settlement Hotel, Cranbourne High School, and a couple of Primary Schools.
Insights: 46 Circle Drive North, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 165 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE (125579698): If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed! 24 Camms Road is set within an amenity filled neighbourhood within walking distance to open parkland, the local bus stop, Cranbourne train station, Camms Road/Sandhurst shopping centres, childcare facilities, public/private schooling and the local medical clinic! Looking further afield you are literally moments from the Marriott Waters shopping precinct with easy freeway/Eastlink access enroute to the CBD!
Looking for a terrific excuse to break into the market or to add to your investment portfolio? You've come to the right place! This property features 3 bedrooms and a functional kitchen offering ample cupboard/bench space, a convection oven, hot plate plus a rangehood. All of this and a whole lot more overlooking the tiled meals zone with external sliding door access!
The light filled family room is equipped with gas heating and a RC/SS air-conditioner, whilst the attached dining room, with easy flow into the kitchen, can easily double up as a home study.
Added internal extras include the separate entry and the central bathroom with both bath and shower facilities. Don't forget the NBN which has already been installed!
If you require extra parking space then take advantage of the double carport and the bonus near new garage with convenient access direct from the street. This shed is complete with power and lighting facilities, shelving and internal walkway access. It would also make the perfect man-cave or workshop.
Nestled on a private allotment measuring app. 585m2 there is a spacious front yard together with a secure, fully fenced rear yard with plenty of room for a trampoline and for the kids and pets to run amuck! Have a kick of the footy whilst family and friends enjoy a Summer time BBQ under the paved pergola, or why not unwind around the fire pit on those chilly nights!
Bonus external features include the gated side access, water tank plus external sun blinds!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES)!

Description:
2 UNITS ON ONE BLOCK
This is a great investment opportunity. Your chance to own two properties without the hassle of an owners corporation. Located within a short walk to the main shopping centre and train station and with transport past the front door.
This pair of two bedroom units each with secure lock up garages offer a solid rental return perfect for your superannuation fund. Leased at $28,380 per annum combined on current leases and to great tenants.
Each property is of solid brick construction have separate kitchens, separate lounges, single bathrooms, tiled roofs and spacious rear gardens. Call now to get more information.

Description:
YOUR INVESTMENT DREAM AWAITS ON A HUGE 1032 sqm CORNER BLOCK!
CRANBOURNE - The three P's POTENTIAL. POTENTIAL. POTENTIAL are all at this address on Averne! Located in a prime position awaiting your inspection is this well loved family home on the market for the first time in 14 years! An established solid brick home with feature walls in the main family/meals area combined with large open separate living room with gorgeous feature open fireplace will entice any astute investor or first home buyer looking for a large corner block and directly opposite parkland with recently updated playground, close to all services including shopping centres, medical centres and local schools. Outside are established garden beds in low maintenance setting, an undercover, enclosed & outdoor alfresco/bbq space off the main kitchen/meals area with its own pond filled with goldfish, a four car lock up garage with Coonara heating and plumbing for sinks and toilet. Inside are three good sized bedrooms, master with ensuite and all have BIR's. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vac, ceiling fans throughout. Spacious family bathroom with corner spa, separate toilet, laundry, secure DLUG with own storage room/home office space - this is a great home for the tradie or tradie at heart and anyone searching for a true family home with investment/development potential. Priced to sell now! Your inspection is a must!
Cranbourne Central
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Centro, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS IN CARLISLE PARK!
CRANBOURNE- CARLISLE PARK ESTATE If you are looking for a low maintenance home set on a 605 sqm block, then this is the property for you! This property is a great first home or solid investment opportunity. Offering 3 generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, master with ensuite, separate family bathroom and separate toilet, open plan kitchen/family/meals leads out to an outdoor undercover alfresco space, this property will impress the astute buyer in today's market. Within a great location close to parkland, local services including Cranbourne Homemaker Centre, Springhill & Thompson Parkway shopping centres, Carlisle & Courtney Gardens Primary Schools. This property also comes with 2 generous sized living areas, remote controlled DLUG, central kitchen, ample cupboard space and stainless steel appliances. Outside, a well constructed pergola to enjoy alfresco dining on those balmy evenings, enjoy the fresh air and watch the kids at play! Your inspection will not disappoint.
Features include:
- Open plan kitchen/Family/Dining/ Stainless steel appliances
- Ducted heating
- Low maintenance yards
- Two Living Areas
- Double car garage with internal access
- Solar Panels
- Side Access with space for extra cars, boat or caravan
Carlisle Park Estate offers beautifully built modern homes close to Cranbourne Homemaker centre which includes Bunnings as well as eateries and Specialist Shops, Carlisle Primary school, Child care centre, Doctors surgery, 24/7 Gymnasium and Springhill Shopping Centre on Thompson Road. The estate is also a short drive to Casey Race, ample sports facilities, easy access to Monash Freeway and Merinda Park Train Station & Public transport.
Please contact Jennifer and she would be happy to help make your dream become a reality.

Description:
Immaculate family home
Need space to park your boat, caravan or trailer, your search ends here. Sitting on a spacious corner block of 600sqm (approx.), this 3 bedroom plus study family home in Brookland Greens Estate has everything that a family needs.
Featuring:
- Master bedroom with en-suite and walk in robe.
- 2 other bedrooms are spacious and have built in robes.
- Formal lounge room.
- Separate dining area.
- Kitchen with double oven and adjoining meals area.
- Rumpus room.
- Study room.
- Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
- Reverse cycle split system in rumpus room.
- Great outdoor entertaining area.
- Security cameras.
- Rear access to a large carport ideal to park a boat, caravan, trailer or extra cars.
- Secure/remote operated gate.
- Double remote garage with internal access.
- Extra parking space in front of the house.
- Garden shed.
- 5000 litres water tank.
Situated right opposite Brookland Greens Reserve with swings, meals area and parklands. It's also close to the Cranbourne Shopping centre, public transport, parks, golf courses, quality schools, colleges and all other amenities. Easy access to Westernport Highway, South Gippsland Highway and Cranbourne-Frankston Road.
Photo ID required for access at inspections.

Description:
Ideal Starter in a Central Location
With plenty of room and in a convenient location, this HAS to be seen IMMEDIATELY!
Ready to move into is this four bedroom, two bathroom property on 612sqm which has three living spaces that are ideally spaced out for privacy.
Walking into the kitchen/meals area, it is clear that this is built for a busy family. Plenty of bench space, stainless steel appliances and lots of cupboards provide practicality.
The front living area is spacious, and the rumpus is ideally positioned for the kids.
All bedrooms have built in robes, the master has a full ensuite & the second bathroom is suitably positioned.
This home is within a walking distance of shops, schools, daycare and any other amenity you could ever need, let alone public transport!
CALL NOW BEFORE YOU MISS OUT!

Description:
Immaculate 5 Bedroom Family Home, With Side Yard Access!
## Brookland Greens Estate ##Designed with quality in mind no detail has been left untouched in perfecting this family home!
As you enter you are greeted by the master bedroom, with its own walk in robe and generous ensuite, deliberately separated from the rest of the floor plan to provide mum and dad with their own luxurious retreat, followed by the beautifully dressed front living room.  
As you continue through the hallway you will find an open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The recently renovated kitchen will surely make you the envy of all your family and friends as it comes packed full of features including, quality stainless steel appliances, 40mm Caesar stone bench tops and plenty of cupboard spaces to cater to all your storage needs!
Offering an additional 4 bedrooms with built in robes, a main bathroom, a separate toilet, a double car garage with internal access to the house and an Alfresco area for when you wish to entertain your family and friends during those hot summer nights.
Other features include:
* Quality Carpets and tiles throughout
* Ceaser stone bench tops
* Heating and cooling
* Professional Landscaping front and back
* Quality flooring throughout
* Side Yard Access
Whether you're a first home buyer or a Family looking for nothing but the best do not miss out on this amazing opportunity as it will not last long!

Description:
Central Cranbourne, Potential Subdivision!! (STCA)
Situated in a quiet street in central Cranbourne only moments from public transport, Train Station, schools, shops and parklands, this three bedroom, one main bathroom residence combines a great floor-plan, loads of natural light, and wonderful private rear gardens to create a home that is perfect for family living and entertaining.
Sunlight fills the beautifully presented interiors creating a warm and inviting environment for family and friends. The generous front living room with its stunning red feature wall offers lovely leafy aspects of the front garden; while the open-plan kitchen and dining room flow through sliding doors to a generous covered outdoor entertaining space, and enormous private rear garden.
Entertaining is so easy with a stylish kitchen featuring gas cook top, wall oven, dishwasher and great storage, overlooking the wonderful outdoor entertaining spaces and extensive lawn area, where children and adults can get together to kick the footy, or play some backyard cricket.
There are three genuine double bedrooms and the sparkling new central bathroom is positioned perfectly to service the whole family.
Features include gas heating, split-system air conditioner, separate laundry, separate WC and a huge carport at the back.
On a brilliant allotment of some 635m2 approx. this home offers a low-maintenance lifestyle for owner-occupiers with plenty of room to extend and add your own personal touches, or alternatively would be a wonderful development opportunity for the astute investor (STCA).
Call Vikram today on 0430392918 for further information.

Gorgeous Presentation - 2 Bedroom Plus A Study
Close to everything, this lovely well presented, low maintenance 2 Bedroom plus study home would be ideal as a first home, for retirees or as an investment property.
The home features open plan living at the rear with a family room with timber floating floors, gas heating, s/s air conditioning and opens out onto the large private decked pergola and low maintenance garden. The open living also adjoins the refurbished kitchen with a newish upright stove with glass splashbacks, Ceaser stone bench tops and overlooks the sunny dining area. There is also a large study/ lounge room which could be converted to a 3rd bedroom.
Not to forget, the full ensuite to the master, alarm, remote garage with internal access and the lovely gardens.
All of this is approximately 500m to Woolworths, Aldi, Dan Murphyâ??s, cafes, take away foods, doctors, bus stop, Kindergarten, Child Care and also within close proximity to schools, parks and the train station, a superb location.
This is a gorgeous home, come see for yourself.

Description:
Central Hounit!
More like a house than a unit this centrally located immaculate 2 bedroom property is within easy walking distance to Cranbourne Train Station, Casey Medical Centre and Centro shopping centre making it a must see for investors or retirees. Surrounded by colourful low maintenance gardens providing a lovely street appeal, the home Comprises of a separate formal lounge, extensive tiled meals area adjoining the well appointed chefs quarters with access to the rear yard and 2 generous size bedrooms with built in robes. Includes Central ducted evaporative cooling, gas heating and accommodation for up to 2 cars with a single lock up garage and adjoining carport. An inspection of this attractive central property will not disappoint. Call Jess now for further details.

Description:
Contemporary Lifestyle and Prime Location
Sitting proudly in an ideal location, this Porter Davis one owner home offers light filled living areas, large 4 bedrooms and huge decked outdoor area. A versatile floor plan offers wide entry, 2 living areas and big open plan kitchen.
- Massive master bedroom with huge WIR and full spacious en-suite
- Great sized formal living
- Large open plan kitchen complementing separate dinning and family areas
- 900mm S/Steel appliances & Dishwasher
- Great outdoor area beautifully decked plus massive backyard
- Ducted heating & evaporative Cooling
- 10 Solar Panels
- Double remote garage with internal and rear access
- Stunningly landscaped front and rear gardens
- Right opposite to Carlisle Park Primary School
You could even sell the car, as this property is only a short stroll to all these facilities listed below: -
- Springhill Shopping Centre
- Springhill Drive Early Learning & Kinder
- Outfit 24 Cranbourne (24 hours Gym)
- Cranbourne Homemaker Centre
- Courtenay Gardens Primary School
- Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School
- Thompson Road Clinic
- Carlisle Park Vikings Cricket Club
- Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre
- Brand New Casey Central Shopping Centre
- Merinda Park railway station
- Bus Stops
Situated in ever popular "Carlisle Park Estate" only 40 minutes to Melbourne CBD with an easy access to Western Port Freeway and Monash Freeway and is surely going to impress and suit all types of buyers with its great size, style and location, so don't wait, put this one on the list for this Saturday & Sunday or contact Naval on 0401 489 262 to arrange a private viewing.

Description:
Tradie's heaven on 660sq
This unique solid brick Victorian style double storey is in a prime location surrounded by other quality homes. A rare opportunity to purchase a quality built home. Comprises:-
- Cosy lounge at the front of the home with stunning rock feature wall and Coonara wood fire plus a feature wall with 100 year old bricks
- Adjoining meals area
- Timber kitchen with stainless style appliances
- Laundry with loads of cupboards
- Four bedrooms with built-in robes
- Upstairs living room with ornate tiled fire place opening onto verandah and separated from the 4th bedroom with bi-fold door creating an ideal space for a teenager or in-law needing privacy
- Family bathroom with large shower and claw-foot bath
- Two toilets
- Storage under stairs
- Ducted heating
- Double garage with built-in bar
- Inground pool with built-in BBQ area
- Room for trailer or caravan
Walking distance to Rangebank Pre-School and Rangebank Primary School, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre & Thomson Parkway and access to public transport. Can life get any better?
Contact Matt Dewan today to arrange an appointment to view this property.
